title: Weekly Wrap: "On Bended Knee."
description: Sam is struck by two guests this week: Los Angeles Times reporter Laura Nelson, and senior writer at ESPN's "The Undefeated," Clinton Yates. They cover new NFL rules, Ramadan, North Korea, and lynx.  Or lynxes. Email the show at samsanders@npr.org and tweet @NPRItsBeenAMin with feels.
